text: Click here for DA cum DEO Post Details District Level Selection Committee Murshidabad Jobs 2017 – 60 ICTC Lab Technican, Counselor & Other Posts: Government of West Bengal, Office of the District Level Selection Committee, Murshidabad has issued a notification for the recruitment of 60 ICTC Lab Technician, Lab Technician for Blood Bank, ICTC Counselor & other vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 16-01-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… District Level Selection Committee Murshidabad Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 60 1. ICTC Counselor: 06 Posts 2. ICTC Lab Technician: 16 Posts 3. Senior Medical Officer (ART Centre, MMC & H): 01 Post 4. Medical Officer (ART Centre, MMC & H): 01 Post 5. Counselor (ART Centre, MMC & H): 02 Posts 6. Staff Nurse (ART Centre, MMC & H): 01 Post 7. Lab Technician (ART Centre, MMC & H): 01 Post 8. OST Medical Officer: 01 Post 9. OST Counsellor: 01 Post 10. Technical Supervisor for Blood Bank: 05 Posts 11. Technical Supervisor for BCSU: 02 Posts 12. Counsellor for Blood Bank: 05 Posts 13. Counsellor of BCSU: 01 Post 14. Lab Technician for Blood Bank: 10 Posts 15. Lab Technician for BCSU: 05 Posts 16. B.T.Van Driver: 01 Post 17. Mobile ICTC Driver: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates maximum age should be 40 years for S.No-1 & 2, 10 to 15, 64 years for S.No-3 & 4,8, 60 years for S.No-5 to 7, 9, between 18-37 years for S.No-16 & 17 as on 16-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable to SC, ST, OBC, PWD & Ex-servicemen as per govt rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess PG Degree/ Diploma or Graduation degree / Diploma in Psychology/ Social Work/ Sociology/ Anthropology/ Human Development/ Nursing for S.No-1, Graduation in Medical Laboratory Technology (B.Sc) or Diploma in Medical Laboratory Technology (DMLT) for S.No-2 & for other details refer notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on written test, oral test for S.No-1,2,5,7,9 & written test, interview for S.No-10 to 15. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application in the prescribed format along with all relevant certificates through speed post/ registered post/ courier only to the office of the Chief Medical Officer of Health (Ground Floor), 14, Cantonment Raod, PO-Berhampore, Dist. Murshidabad, Pin-742101, Eest Bengal on or before 16-01-2017. Last Date for Submission of Application: 16-01-2017. For more details like qualification, experience, remuneration, mode of selection & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Corrigendum - DHFWS Basirhat Jobs 2017 – Medical Technologist, Technician Supervisor & Other Posts: Government of West Bengal, District Health & Family Welfare Samiti, Office of the Chief Medical Officer of Health, Basirahat Health District has invited applications for the recruitment of Technical Supervisor, Lab Technician, Counselor, Medical Technologist (Lab), Medical Technologist (X-Ray/ RD) & Medical Technologist (ECG) vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed format on or before 13-01-2017 By 05:00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & Other details are given below… DHFWS Basirhat Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 10 Name of the Posts: 1. Technical Supervisor, Blood Bank: 01 Post 2. Lab Technician, Blood Bank: 01 Post 3. Counselor, Blood Bank: 01 Post 4. Medical Technologist (Lab): 02 Posts 5. Medical Technologist (X-Ray / RD): 03 Posts 6. Medical Technologist (ECG): 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be 40 years for post 1, 2, 3, 18 to 37 years for Post 4, 5, 6 as on 01-01-2016. Age relaxation is admissible as per Govt rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should have passed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics/ Biological Science, Diploma or Degree, DMLT/ BMLT/ M./Sc in MLKT/ PGDMLT for Post 1, 2, Master/ Post Graduate Degree in Psychology/ Social Work/ Scoiology/ Antyhropology/ Human Development from any recognized by the central or State Govt, knowledge of computer for Post 3, 10+2 Exam with Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Diploma in Laboratory Technology/ Radiography (Diagnostics) Tech/ ECG Technology in Govt of West Bengal for Post 4, 5, 6. Selection Process: Selection will be based on written test, interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application in prescribed format along with self attested documents of qualification, mark sheets, experience, caste, residential proof, Photo ID proof, admit card of Madhyamik exam (Age proof) in an envelope super scripted as “Name of the Post, Self Address, Ph No.” to Member Secretary, DLSC & CMOH, Basirhat Health District on or before 13-01-2017 By 05:00 PM Last Date for receipt of Application: 13-01-2017 By 05:00 PM. For more details like salary, experience & other details click on the following link…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form - Dr BC Roy PGIPS Kolkata Jobs 2017 – MT (Lab ) & MT (X-Ray) Posts: Government of West Bengal, Dr BC Roy Post Graduate Institute of Pediatric Sciences, Kolkata has issued a notification for the recruitment of MT (Lab ) & MT (X-Ray) vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 24-01-2017 by 04.00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Dr BC Roy PGIPS Kolkata Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 06 1. MT (Lab): 04 Posts 2. MT (X-Ray): 02 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18-37 years as on 01 st January of the year of advertisement. Age relaxation is applicable to SC, ST & OBC as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should have passed 10+2 examination or its equivalent with physics, chemistry & Biology and a two year diploma in Laboratory Technologist/ Radiography (Diagnostics) DRD (Tech) recognized in the Government of West Bengal. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application with full bio-data (computer typed), e-mail ID and contact number should be addressed o the Chairperson, Selection Committee for the recruitment of MT (Lab ) & MT (X-Ray), C/o Principal, Dr BC Roy Post Graduate Institute of Pediatric Sciences, 111 Narkeldanga Main Road, Kolkata-700054 on or before 24-01-2017 by 04.00 PM. Important Dates: Last Date for Submission of Application: 24-01-2017 by 04.00 PM. Probable Date of Interview: 31-01-2017. For more details like remuneration, qualification, experience & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt – District Magistrate Jalpaiguri Jobs 2017 – Data Manager Posts: Govt of West Bengal, Office of the Distrcit Magistrate, Jalpaiguri has advertised a notification for the recruitment of Data Manager vacancies in Rajganj and Sadar Blocks in district Project Management purely on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in prescribed application format on or before 20-01-2017 by 05.30 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below…. District Magistrate Jalpaiguri Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 02 Name of the Post: Data Manager 1. Rajganj: 01 Post 2. Sadar: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be in between 18 – 37 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess Graduation in any discipline, Certificate in Computer applications, must have typing speed 30 wpm. How to Apply: Eligible candidates can send their application in prescribed format along with self attested photo copies of proof residence, age, education/ essential qualification, computer knowledge, experience etc., & in an envelope should be superscribed as “Application for Data Manager, Kanyashree Prakalpa” to Block Development Officer on or before 20-01-2017 by 05.30 PM. Last Date for receipt of Application: 20-01-2017 by 05.30 PM. For more details like tenure, remuneration, vacancy details, emolument, selection process, age relaxation, Salary and benefits, compensation & other information click on the link given below…. Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form Suri Municipality Jobs 2017 – Manager & Office Asst Posts: Suri Municipality, Birbhum has invited applications for the recruitment of Manager cum Placement & Marketing Coordinator, Office Assistant cum Coordinator vacancies on contractual basis for the residents of Suri Municipality. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed application format on or before 13-01-2017. Other details like age, qualification, selection process, how to apply are given below… Suri Municipality Vacancy Details: Total No. of posts: 02 Name of the Posts: 1. Manager cum Placement & Marketing Coordinator: 01 Post 2. Office Assistant cum Coordinator: 01 Post Age Limit: Candidates age should be 21 – 35 years as on 01-01-2017. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Graduation for Post 1, B.Com Graduate for post 2 with relevant experience. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their applications to Chairman, Suri Municipality, Birbhum on or before 13-01-2017. Last Date for Receipt of Applications: 13-01-2017. For more details like salary & other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt - Office of the Sub Divisional Officer Ranaghat Jobs 2017 – DEO Posts: Government of West Bengal, Office of the Sub Divisional Officer Ranaghat has announced a notification for the recruitment of Data Entry Operator (DEO) vacancies on contract basis. Eligible candidates may apply in prescribed format on or before 13-01-2017 up to 05:00 PM. Other details like educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Office of the Sub Divisional Officer Ranaghat Vacancy Details: Total No of Posts: 01 Name of the Post: Data Entry Operator Age Limit: Candidates age should be 40 years as on 01-01-2017. Age relaxation is applicable for SC/ ST, 3 years for OBC candidates. Educational Qualification: Candidates should possess Graduation in any Branch with certificate in Computer Application from the Govt. Recognized Institution. Selection Process: Shortlisted candidates will be called for proficiency test. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may send their application in prescribed format along with self attested copies of relevant certificates to Development Section of SDO Office, Ranghat at Ground Flora of New Administrative Building of SDO Office, Ranaghat on or before 13-01-2017 up to 05:00 PM. . Last Date to for Submission of Applications: 13-01-2017 up to 05:00 PM. For more details like pay scale, reservation and other information click on the link given below… Click here for Recruitment Advt & Application Form – Mathabhanga Muncipality Cooch Behar Jobs 2017 – DA cum DEO Posts: Office of the Councillors, Mathabhanga Muncipality, Cooch Behar has issued a notification for the recruitment of Dealing Assistant cum Data Entry Operator vacancies on contractual basis. Eligible candidates can apply in the prescribed application format on or before 20-01-2017 up to 05.00 PM. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process & how to apply are given below… Mathabhanga Muncipality Cooch Behar Vacancy Details: Total No.of Posts: 01 Name of the Posts: DA cum CEO Age Limit: Candidates age should be between 18-40 years as on 01-04-2016. Age relaxation is applicable to SC/ ST/ OBC candidates as per rules. Educational Qualification: Candidates should have passed 10+2 in any discipline and at least 6 months course in Basic Computer. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on Computer Proficiency Test & Interview. How to Apply: Eligible candidates send their application in the prescribed format along with self attested photocopies of all testimonials and certificates issued by the competent authority, 2 copies of self attested passport size photographs, self addressed envelope 4″ x 8″size with postage stamp of Rs. 5/- & envelope should be superscribed with “Recruitment to the post of Dealing Assistant cum Data Entry Operator” should be sent to the Chairman, Mathabhanga Municipality, P.O Mathabhanga, Dist. Cooch behar, Pin-736146 by post or by hand on or before 20-01-2017 up to 05.00 PM. Last Date for Submission of Application: 20-01-2017 up to 05.00 PM. For more details like qualification, experience, remuneration & other information click on the link given below….
